attributes.action: All current MPs should be de-barred from taking up any future political office.
attributes.additional_details:
A very useful and unbiased article appears  on The Week web site:
"Brexit: pros and cons of leaving the EU". Please read it.

Arguments about our membership of the EU concern the inredibly important subjects of politics, security, economics and national identity:

The current crop of MPs have shown that they are incompetent, and are incapable of governing this country and should all be de-barred from holding any form of local or national political office once this parliament comes to an end.
attributes.background: Britain is renowned worldwide for its representative parliamentary democracy. Not for nothing is the House of Westminster known as ‘The Mother of Parliaments’. However, this shining beacon has become the laughing stock of the world and a shambolic gaggle of egocentric hypocrites.
